section.p: Publishing a marketable service means making it available to customers for subscription on a marketplace of your choice.

The following prerequisites must be fulfilled for publishing a service:
A price model must have been defined for the service. For details, refer to .
Access to the marketplace and the permission to publish services on it must have been granted by the marketplace owner.
Publishing a service involves selecting the marketplace, activating the service, and publishing the URL of the marketplace. These tasks are described in more detail in the sections below.
